httpProxy.title: (Advanced) HTTP Proxy
httpProxy.subtitle: Enter your own HTTP proxy to access geo-restricted content. This will only work with compatible Bare servers.
httpProxy.badBare: Your Bare server doesn't support HTTP proxies.
httpProxy.badProxy: Proxy connection failed. Please double check that your HTTP proxy is working.

bareError: That didn't quite work. Double check that the bare server exists and isn't blocked.

1.q: How do I get more links?
1.a: You can more links by joining our

2.q: How can I self host Nebula?
2.a: Instructions for self hosting Nebula can be found at our

3.q: Nebula won't work for me, what can I do?
3.aMobile: Try going into settings, clicking on your browser, and clearing cache.

4.a: An HTTP proxy is like a VPN. It can change your IP's location to allow you to access geo-restricted content that only other countries can access.

5.q: Where can I get an HTTP proxy?
5.a: You can look up a tutorial on how to run your own or buy one online. HTTP proxies are coming to boosters in our discord server in the near future so be on the lookout.

6.a: You might be connected to the wrong server. Check the bare server you are connected to and make sure its the country you're closest to.
